title: Seminar on Research Integrity for IPZ students at A'dam Univ Applied Sci
description:
The seminar:
1.  Answers 4 questions students sent after they read the Duct Code on Research Integrity
2. Explains how conflicts of interest arise (commercial, political, research-career related)
3. Explains how the literature we read may be a filtered selection of what exists (selective reporting bias)
4. Explains what replication studies are for
5. Shows the main sources of Avoidable Research Waste
6. Suggest the use of an open science checklist to increase the chances that your research is responsible research
